entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
